title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions: Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc - the ultimate light-up disc for endless fun! With 16 million color RGB LEDs, this disc shines 100x brighter than any other light-up disc on the market. The smart modes, motion sensors, and automatic light control make it a game-changer for night play and freestyle tricks. Rechargeable in just 30 minutes, it offers up to a thousand throws or 90 minutes of match time. The 175g weight and professional standard make it perfect for players of all levels. Get your hands on this durable, waterproof disc today and elevate your disc games to a whole new level! Perfect as a Christmas, birthday, or camping gift for men, boys, teens, and kids.

Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc - the ultimate light-up frisbee that will take your outdoor fun to the next level! With 16 million color RGB LEDs, choose from 36 or 360 LEDs for an incredibly bright display that will amaze everyone around you. 

Featuring smart modes like adjustable brightness, timer mode, and motion sensors for automatic light-up, this rechargeable disc only takes 30 minutes to charge and provides up to a thousand throws or 90 minutes of match time. The sleek design and professional standard weight of 175 grams make it perfect for players of all levels.

Whether you're playing at night, performing freestyle tricks, or engaging in disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes, the TOSY Flying Disc is the game-changer you need. Plus, it's waterproof and built to last, so you can enjoy endless hours of fun in any weather.

Don't miss out on the coolest Christmas, birthday, or camping gift for men, boys, teens, and kids. Get your hands on the TOSY Flying Disc today and experience the thrill of flying in style!
